T02D3394:57b-1: kan ka barna pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3394:57b-3: gser mdog can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3394:57b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3394:57b-5: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos bde ba'i stan la gnas te /
T02D3394:57b-6: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su
T02D3394:57b-7: gyur pa las zla ba'i dbus su dh'i:ser po rnam
T02D3394:57b-8: par bsgoms la / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das ma bkug ste /
T02D3394:57b-9: rang gi mdun du bzhugs su gsol la /
T02D3394:57b-10: de las byung ba'i me tog la sogs pa bsgom bzhin pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D3394:57b-11: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3394:57b-12: de'i rjes su tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon
T02D3394:57b-13: du 'gro bas yud tsam gyis stong pa nyid bsgom
T02D3394:57b-15: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes bya'o //
T02D3394:57b-16: phyis ni nam mkha'i phyogs su dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3394:57b-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dh'i:ser po la aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug gis bskor ba /
T02D3394:57b-18: de nas ka la sogs pa gsal byed sum cu
T02D3394:57b-19: rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dh'i:yongs su gyur
T02D3394:57b-20: pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i
T02D3394:57b-21: po ti sa bon gyis nye bar mtshan pa bsgoms
T02D3394:57b-22: la / thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bcom
T02D3394:57b-23: ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D3394:57b-24: ma mdog ser mo sna tshogs padma'i gdan la skyil
T02D3394:57b-26: phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma /
T02D3394:57b-27: chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
T02D3394:57b-28: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3394:57b-29: g-yon phyogs su gnas pa'i padma'i dbus su shes rab
T02D3394:57b-30: kyi pha rol tu phyin ma mdog ser mo'i po
T02D3394:57b-36: bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom a'a:dh'i:h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D3394:57b-37: gser mdog can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3394:57b-38: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
